name: digitaljs-vsc
description: Integration of digital logic simulator DigitalJS with Visual Studio Code.
author: Micha≈Ç Markiewicz

digitaljs-VSC.spawnInTheSameColumn.description: Controls whether DigitalJS Panel will appear in the same column or one beside the one with source file.

digitaljs-VSC.optimizeInYosys.description: Controls Yosys optimization of the synthesized circuit ('opt -full'). This might make the circuit differ significantly from its HDL specification.

digitaljs-VSC.simplifyDiagram.description: Controls activation of post-processing of Yosys output to reduce the number of components and improve the readability.

digitaljs-VSC.layoutEngine.description: Changes how the circuit elements are automatically positioned after synthesis. ElkJS is more readable, Dagre is legacy.

digitaljs-VSC.simulationEngine.description: Changes how the synthesized circuit is sumulated. WebWorker engine is currently unavailable and will not take an effect. The synchronous engine is well tested, but slower in comparison to WebWorker.

digitaljs-VSC.experimentalFsmTransform.description: Enables finite state machine processing in yosys. This corresponds to the 'fsm' and 'fsm -nomap' Yosys commands.

digitaljs-VSC.mergeMoreLogicIntoFsm.description: This corresponds to the '-expand' part of 'fsm' Yosys command. Works only if Fsm Transform option is not set to Disabled.

commands.title: Generate DigitalJS compatible json from current .v/.sv file
